description:
{"blocks":[{"key":"92db","text":"Gibson assembly requires a vector backbone and one or more inserts that have been PCR amplified. The inserts should have 15-20 base pairs of overlap at ligation sites, so primers used to amplify the inserts should contain a tail overhang with this homology. The vector backbone should be linear.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"13n4u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"csnc1","text":"A Gibson reaction uses a master mix that can be homemade or commercially purchased. Add the appropriate amount of master mix, then your vector and insert at 2-3 fold molar excess for a 20 µl reaction. Exact ratios will need to be optimized based on the size of your vector and inserts and how many inserts you have. Incubate this reaction at 50°C for 60 minutes. Then transform this reaction into DH5 alpha (or competent cell of choice) and plate on LB agar with appropriate antibiotic.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1i487","text":"




","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

MgCl2                                ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":32,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cekmo","text":"DTT                                   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6j1pn","text":"dNTPs [NEB, N0447S]       ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ahg88","text":"NAD                                     
10U/µl T5 exonuclease [NEB, M0663S]
2U/µl Phusion polymerase [Thermo, F530S]
40U/µl Taq Ligase [NEB, M0208S]
Sterile water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":116,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a9qkj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2i7qv","text":"Competent cells (DH5α) [Thermo, 18258012]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17knl","text":"PCR machine","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jjcj","text":"LB, LB agar","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4qgsn","text":"antibiotic of choice
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dhv4h","text":"25% PEG-8000\t\t        1.25 g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5acro","text":"500 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.5\t2.5 ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5p6vc","text":"50 mM MgCl2\t\t        0.25 ml of 1M","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":10,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b9imh","text":"50 mM DTT\t\t                0.25 ml of 1M","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1bcn","text":"1 mM each dNTPs\t                0.05 ml each of 100mM","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2nemn","text":"5 mM NAD\t\t                0.5 ml of 50 mM","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ek8as","text":"Master Mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d26ad","text":"320 µl \t5X Reaction Buffer (above)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2opt","text":"0.64 µl \t10U/µl T5 exonuclease","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5kngq","text":"20 µl\t2U/µl Phusion","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cak9o","text":"160 µl\t40U/µl Taq Ligase","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5n6ct","text":"700 µl\tWater","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"id05","text":"Prepare linearized vector backbone by restriction enzyme digestion or PCR amplification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bpvu0","text":"Prepare inserts by PCR amplification. Ensure that each insert has 15-20 base pairs of overlap with other inserts/vector at ligation sites, added by primer design.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5jhl6","text":"Take a 15 ul aliquot of 1.5x Gibson master mix on ice. Add 50-100 ng of vector with 2-3 fold molar excess of PCR inserts, and sterile water if necessary, to make total reaction volume up to l.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":190,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3e0fq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
